PARAGRAPH.STRING: , officially the Islamic Republic of Pakistan ([Urdu: اسلامی جمہوریۂ پاکستان]), is a country located in South Asia that overlaps with the Greater Middle East.
has a thousand-kilometre coastline along the Arabian Sea in the south and
borders Afghanistan and Iran to the west, India to the east and the People's Republic of China in the far northeast.
is the sixth most populous country in the world and
is the second most populous Muslim country.

was established as a modern state in 1947, as one of the two parts of the partitioned British India, but the region has a long history of settlement and civilisation including the Indus Valley Civilisation. The region was invaded by Persians, Greeks, Arabs, Turks, Mongols, Afghans, and was incorporated into the British Raj in the nineteenth century. Since independence,
has experienced times of significant military and economic growth, and periods of instability, with the secession of East Pakistan (present-day Bangladesh).
is a declared nuclear weapons state.
